availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred T. Nall (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Larkin Nall. Married to Annie Chaddock Nall. Merchant in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860. Served in the 12th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a quartermaster sergeant from August 1862 to January 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 89.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 783.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 000494958, p. 288.
Find A Grave, "Alfred T. Nall (December 31, 1840-November 26, 1905)," Memorial #71450368, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/71450368 (accessed January 14, 2019).
U.S., Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, Records of the Department of Veterans Affairs, 1773 - 2007, The National Archives at Washington, D.C., Series T288.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Ohio County, KY, September 1863, p. 481, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
